name: Tap Water
information: Tap water causes up to 1000 times less CO2 emissions than bottled water. Drinking 2 litres of bottled water every day for a year is equivalent to driving 500 miles (1kg CO2 per 6km). Drink tap water.

name: Bottled Water
information: Bottled water causes up to 1000 times more CO2 emissions than tap water. Drinking 2 litres of bottled water every day for a year is equivalent to driving 500 miles (1kg CO2 per 6km). Drink tap water.
